src:
Zvanično: Milan Lešnjak selektor omladinaca
Selekcija do 19 godina dobila novog kormilara

05 Nov 2019

Omladinska reprezentacija Srbije se plasirala u narednu rundu kvalifikacija za Prvenstvo Evrope naredne godine, ali igrom nije razočarala. Daleko od toga. Ubedljiv poraz od Španije upalio je alarme na Terazijama 35, pa je Izvršni odbor odlučio da promeni selektora. Ono o čemu se danima spekulisalo, sada je dobilo i zvaničnu potvrdu.
Novi selektor omladinske reprezentacije Srbije u narednom periodu biće Milan Lešnjak. Nekadašnji libero Crvene zvezde i Obilića dolazi na funkciju umesto Ivana Jevića.



Milan Lešnjak ima dug staž kada je reč o omladinskom fudbalu. Radio je u omladinskoj školi Čukaričkog, zatim je sličnu funkciju obavljao u Crvenoj zvezdi. Igrače Crvene zvezde rođene 2000. godine doveo je do titule omladinskog prvaka Srbije posle fantastičnog preokreta u poslednjem kolu protiv Partizana (4:3). Posle tog meča otišao je iz matičnog kluba, ali je nedavno viđen u Londonu, gde je imao savetodavnu ulogu.
Lešnjak je kratko vodio i seniorski tim Čukaričkog.
(Foto Star Sport)

text:
Official: Milan Lesnjak youth coach
Selection under 19 gets a new helmsman

05 Nov 2019

Serbia's youth team advanced to the next round of European Championship qualifications next year, but it did not disappoint with the game. Far from it. A convincing defeat against Spain triggered alarms at Terazije 35, so the Executive Board decided to change the selectors. What has been speculated about for days has now received official confirmation.
The new coach of the Serbian youth team will be Milan Lesnjak in the coming period. The former libero of Crvena Zvezda and Obilic takes office instead of Ivan Jevic.



Milan Lešnjak has a long experience in youth football. He worked at the Cukaricki youth school, then held a similar position at Red Star. Born in 2000, he brought the Red Star players to the title of youth champion of Serbia after a fantastic turn in the last round against Partizan (4: 3). He left the home club after that match, but was recently seen in London, where he played an advisory role.
Hazelnut was also briefly led by the Cukaricki senior team.
(Photo Star Sport)
